item.title: 🔴 07:44 Air anxiety in the Odesa region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 07:44 Air anxiety in the Odesa region follow the following messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
